GSD.description:
dm raid: fix address sanitizer warning in raid_resume

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.61 by commit 50235d9a1f1f742619ed9963cb9f240e5b821d46. For more details please see the references link.
